info.title: Harvest
info.description: Harvest is a simple tool to help track the time spent by your team on each project and task.

get.description: Triggers when a new user is added.
Triggers when a new client is added.
Triggers when a new contact is added.
Triggers when a new project is created.

get.summary: When a time entry is created for the current day
get.description: Triggers when a new time entry is created for the current day.

get.summary: When a time entry is created for date
get.description: Triggers when a new time entry is created for a specific date.
Retrieves a list of all contacts for the authenticated user.
Retrieves a list of all clients for the authenticated account.

currency.description: The currency you'd like to use for the client.

currency_symbol.description: Symbol that correlates to the selected currency.

details.description: Additional details, normally used for address information.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all users of the authenticated account.
Lists all projects for the current user.

post.description: Add an existing user to a project.

get.description: Get an existing time entry by id.
Retrieves a list of all tasks.
Retrieve a user's details by user id or email.

currency.description: Currency to use for client billing.

currency_symbol.description: Symbol that correlates to the selected currency.

details.description: Additional details, normally used for address information.

id.description: Unique identifier of the time entry.

user_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the time entry.

project_id.description: Id of the project time entry is associated with.

task_id.description: Id of the task time entry is associated with.

project.description: Name of project the time entry is associated with.

task.description: Name of task the time entry is associated with.

client.description: Name of client the time entry is associated with.

hours_without_timer.description: Current amount of time tracked, if timer is not running.

hours.description: Number of (decimal time) hours tracked in this time entry.

client_id.description: Id of client for the project.

active.description: True if the project is currently active.

billable.description: True if the project is billable.

bill_by.description: Method by which the project is invoiced.

cost_budget.description: Budget value for Total Project Fees projects.

cost_budget_include_expenses.description: Option for budget of Total Project Fees projects to include tracked expenses.

is_admin.description: True if the user is an admin.

is_contractor.description: True if the user is a contractor.

is_active.description: True if the user is currently active.

department.description: Department name the user works in.

wants_newsletter.description: True if the user wants to subscribe to the newsletter.

task_id.description: Id of task the time entry is associated with.

task.description: Name of task the time entry is associated with.

client.description: Name of client the time entry is associated with.

id.description: Unique identifier of the time entry.

hours_without_timer.description: Current amount of time tracked, if timer is not running.

hours.description: Number of (decimal time) hours tracked in this time entry.

DAY_ENTRY_ID__in_path.name: DAY_ENTRY_ID
DAY_ENTRY_ID__in_path.description: The id of the time entry

DayInPath.name: day
DayInPath.description: Day of the year in range (1, 366)

OfUserNonAdvanced.name: of_user
OfUserNonAdvanced.description: The id of the user to check time entries for. Defaults to your id.

OfUser.name: of_user
OfUser.description: The id of the user to check time entries for.
